autoTopup(uint256).details: This uses a virtual balance approach - tracks budget allocation rather than actual USDCAvailable balance = budgetPerPeriod - (periodSpent + periodReserved)

params.allowedChains: Array of chain IDs where spends are allowed
params.approvalThreshold: Amounts above this require approval (in USDC, 6 decimals)
params.approver: Address of the manager who can approve spends
params.budgetPerPeriod: Budget amount per period (in USDC, 6 decimals)
params.dailyLimit: Maximum amount per day (in USDC, 6 decimals, 0 = use perTxLimit)
params.label: Human-readable label (e.g., "Marketing", "Alice Travel")
params.perTxLimit: Maximum amount per transaction (in USDC, 6 decimals)
params.periodDuration: Duration of budget period in seconds

returns._0: accountId The ID of the newly created account

params.requestId: The request ID that was executed

pause().details: When paused, the following operations are blocked:      - createSpendAccount: Cannot create new accounts      - requestSpend: Cannot request new spends      - approveSpend: Cannot approve pending requests      - markSpendExecuted: Cannot mark spends as executed      The following cleanup operations remain available when paused:      - rejectSpend: Can reject pending requests      - markSpendFailed: Can mark approved requests as failed      This allows emergency shutdown while still permitting failure cleanup.

requestSpend(uint256,uint256,uint256,add.details: Daily limit semantics: The dailyLimit is enforced at approval time based on      dailySpent + dailyReserved. Requests approved on Day 1 but executed on Day 2      will have their reservations reset when the day changes, but the actual execution      on Day 2 counts against Day 2's dailySpent. This means the limit controls      "approval rate per day" rather than "execution rate per day".

returns._0: requestId The ID of the created spend request

params.minBalance: Minimum balance threshold to trigger topup

sweepAccount(uint256).details: Returns unspent virtual balance to treasury (reduces committed budget)

params.allowedChains: New array of allowed chain IDs

params.approvalThreshold: New approval threshold (0 to keep current)
params.approver: New approver address (address(0) to keep current)
params.budgetPerPeriod: New budget per period (0 to keep current)
params.dailyLimit: New daily limit (0 to keep current)
params.perTxLimit: New per-transaction limit (0 to keep current)

freezeAccount(uint256).notice: Freeze a spend account (prevents new spend requests)

isPeriodEnded(uint256).notice: Check if account period has ended

markSpendExecuted(uint256,string).notice: Mark a spend as executed (called by backend after Gateway execution)

markSpendFailed(uint256,string).notice: Mark a spend as failed (called by backend if Gateway execution fails)

recordInboundFunding(uint256,string).notice: Record inbound funding to Gateway wallet

recordOutboundFunding(uint256,string).notice: Record outbound funding from Gateway wallet

requestSpend(uint256,uint256,uint256,add.notice: Request a spend from an account

resetPeriod(uint256).notice: Reset the budget period for an account

setAutoTopupConfig(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Configure auto-topup settings for an account

sweepAccount(uint256).notice: Sweep unspent budget from an account at end of period

transferAdmin(address).notice: Transfer admin rights to a new address

updateAllowedChains(uint256,uint256[]).notice: Update allowed chains for an account
